availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Fleming County, Kentucky, laborer. Fleming County native. Son of Burgess Dearing and Amanda Dearing. Resident of Fleming County in 1850. Laborer in Fleming County in 1860. Farmer in Fleming County in 1863.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fleming County, Division 2, p. 399. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fleming County, District 2, p. 128. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fleming County, Flemingsburg, p. 211. Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Fleming County, KY, October 1863, p. 102, (Accessed via ancestry.com). Kentucky Vital Statistics Original Death Certificates (1911-1955), Ancestry, 1928, Mason County, file no. 13443.
